full_summary:
================

**RFSA - Establish Service Arrangements to Supply Educational Services**
====================================================================

**Procurement Reference:** WS3675739009-Doc3675904770
**Publication Date:** 2022-09-21
**Closing Date:** 2022-09-22T14:00:00

**Background**
------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals from qualified service providers to establish service arrangements (SAs) for the supply of educational services.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The SAs will provide teaching and educational research services (UNSPSC Code: 86132206) to various government agencies in Canada. Proposals must demonstrate the capability to deliver high-quality training and research services tailored to the needs of the end-users.

**Eligibility Criteria**
------------------------

To be eligible, service providers must:

* Be a registered business with the relevant government authorities
* Have the necessary expertise and resources to deliver the required services
* Demonstrate a strong understanding of the educational research services market

**Evaluation Criteria**
----------------------

Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical merits (40%)
	+Demonstrated expertise in educational research services
	+Quality of training methodologies
	+Commitment to ongoing research and development
* Commercial capabilities (30%)
	+Business structure and financial stability
	+Proven track record of delivering educational services
	+Commitment to meeting contractual obligations
* Pricing (30%)
	+Reasonableness of pricing structure
	+Demonstrated value for money

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This procurement is covered by the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For more information, please contact:

April Charron
april.charron@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Important Dates**
-------------------

* Closing date: 2022-09-22T14:00:00
* Expected contract start date: 2022-10-31
